TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlReturnReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeReturnReader

summary.span: 从使用 HTTP 但不支持 SOAP 实现的 Web 服务客户端的传入响应正文中编入的 XML 读取返回值。

span.span: Reads return values from XML that is encoded in the body of incoming responses for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和中的其他类命名空间支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务编写器和读卡器序列化和反序列化，分别的参数或返回对象的 Web 方法的 HTTP 请求或响应流之间。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务编写器和读卡器使用 HTTP 传输，但不交换使用 SOAP 标准的消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 类将实现客户端读取 XML 文档读入 Web 方法返回值。The class implements the client-side reading of XML documents into Web method return values. XML 文档进行编码的 HTTP 响应正文中。The XML documents are encoded in the body of HTTP responses. 你通常不需要使用直接。You typically will not need to use directly. 相反，当 Wsdl.exe 工具生成的 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 实现根据客户端代理代码，它适用指向每个 Web 方法和设置特性的属性。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to .

Public Sub New ()
public: XmlReturnReader();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object GetInitializer (System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ GetInitializer(System::Web::Services::Protocols::LogicalMethodInfo ^ methodInfo);

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，指定为其获取初始值设定项的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 返回指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: Returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: An initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递到 Initialize 方法的对象。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the Initialize method. 有关类，初始值设定项是Web 方法的返回类型的对象。For the class, the initializer is an object for the return type of the Web method. 服务初始化期间调用方法。The method is invoked during service initialization. 更高版本，在处理响应时，初始值设定项对象传递给方法的另一个实例。Later, at the time a response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the method of another instance. 另一个实例执行实际的读取。The other instance performs the actual reading.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object[] GetInitializers (System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo[] methodInfos);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object[] GetInitializers(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo[] methodInfos) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetInitializers (methodInfos As LogicalMethodInfo()) As Object()
public: override cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ GetInitializers(cli::array <System::Web::Services::Protocols::LogicalMethodInfo ^> ^ methodInfos);

param.name: methodInfos
param.span: 类型的数组，指定为其获取初始值设定项的 Web 方法。

span.span: An array of type that specifies the Web methods for which the initializers are obtained.

summary.span: 返回与方法定义的输入数组相对应的初始值设定项对象的数组。

span.span: Returns an array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.

returns.span: 与方法定义的输入数组对应的初始值设定项对象的数组。

span.span: An array of initializer objects corresponding to an input array of method definitions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递到 Initialize 方法的对象。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the Initialize method. 有关类，初始值设定项是Web 方法的返回类型的对象。For the class, the initializer is an object for the return type of the Web method. 服务初始化期间调用方法。The method is invoked during service initialization. 更高版本，在处理响应时，每个 Web 方法的初始值设定项对象传递给方法的另一个实例。Later, at the time a response is processed, the initializer object for each Web method is passed to the method of another instance. 另一个实例执行实际的读取。The other instance performs the actual reading.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (object o);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(object o) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (o As Object)
public: override void Initialize(System::Object ^ o);

param.name: o
param.span: 一个 ，用于正在调用的 Web 方法的返回类型。

span.span: An for the return type of the Web method being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供使用对象方法进行 HTTP 响应中包含的 XML 文档反序列化。The method supplies the object used by the method to deserialize an XML document contained in the HTTP response. 在处理请求时调用方法。The method is invoked at the time a request is processed. 输入的参数， `o`，通过调用获取或在客户端初始化过程中的另一个实例上的方法。The input parameter, `o`, is obtained by calling the or method on another instance during client initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object Read (System.Net.WebResponse response, System.IO.Stream responseStream);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object Read(class System.Net.WebResponse response, class System.IO.Stream responseStream) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (response As WebResponse, responseStream As Stream) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ Read(System::Net::WebResponse ^ response, System::IO::Stream ^ responseStream);

param.name: response
param.span: 一个 对象，它包含某个操作的输出消息。

span.span: An object containing the output message for an operation.

param.name: responseStream
param.span: 一个 ，其内容是由 response 参数表示的 HTTP 响应的正文。

span.span: A whose content is the body of the HTTP response represented by the response parameter.

summary.span: 从 HTTP 响应中包含的 XML 文档获取反序列化的返回值。

span.span: Gets a return value deserialized from an XML document contained in the HTTP response.

returns.span: 包含在 HTTP 响应中的 XML 文档的反序列化的返回值。

span.span: A return value deserialized from an XML document contained in the HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要反序列化的 XML 内容的 HTTP 响应，类的实现方法使用对象作为参数传递方法。To deserialize the XML content of the HTTP response, the class's implementation of the method uses the object passed as an argument to the method. 如果 HTTP 响应的 MIME 内容类型不是引发了异常`text/xml`。It throws an exception if the HTTP response's MIME content type is not `text/xml`. 该方法返回反序列化的 Web 方法返回值前关闭响应。The method closes the response before returning the deserialized Web method return value.
